name: Project: Chicken Gun Fangame
description:
** THIS PROJECT IS ON DEVELOPMENT, WERE GONNA SEND SOME TEST BUILDS FOR NOW, KEEP WAITING **

Project: Chicken Gun Fangame is a online multiplayer game fangame  of the chicken gun mobile game, this game is still in pretty early states and needs to be fixed some bugs and errors

This Contains:

- Online-Multiplayer

- A Basic Movement 

- A Create and Join System

Enjoy the early ass game
